code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./AppointmentForm.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AppointmentForm=_ref=>{let{doctorName,doctorSpeciality,onSubmit}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[phoneNumber,setPhoneNumber]=useState('');const[date,setDate]=useState('');const[time,setTime]=useState('');const handleFormSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit({name,phoneNumber,date,time});setName('');setPhoneNumber('');setDate('');setTime('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleFormSubmit,className:"appointment-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Book Appointment with Dr. ",doctorName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"phoneNumber",children:"Phone Number:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",id:"phoneNumber",value:phoneNumber,onChange:e=>setPhoneNumber(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"date",children:"Appointment Date:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",id:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"time",children:"Appointment Time:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",id:"time",value:time,onChange:e=>setTime(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Book Appointment"})]});};export default AppointmentForm;
